title: The Dark Laugh
plot: A brooding superhero accidentally joins a circus. Chaos and balloons ensue.
joke: This is the only Batman film with a pie fight.

title: Avengers: End of Snacks
plot: When half of the universe's snacks disappear, the Avengers must go grocery shopping.
joke: Even Thanos couldn't snap open a Pringles can.

title: Interstellar Delivery
plot: A pizza delivery guy takes a wrong turn and ends up in a black hole.
joke: 30 minutes or light-years — guaranteed!

title: The LOLfather
plot: An Italian crime boss starts a stand-up comedy club in Brooklyn.
joke: He'll make you laugh... an offer you can't refuse.

title: Forrest Jump
plot: Forrest discovers trampolines and rewrites history again — but with flips.
joke: Life is like a box of springs.

title: Jurassic Bark
plot: Scientists clone dinosaurs, but accidentally use dog DNA.
joke: Fetch takes on a whole new meaning.

title: Star Wars: The Nap Awakens
plot: A Jedi oversleeps and misses the entire rebellion.
joke: May the snooze be with you.

title: Finding Memo
plot: A fish searches the ocean for his lost sticky notes.
joke: He forgot what he was looking for.

title: The Fast and the Curious
plot: Street racers stop to ask for directions. Every. Single. Time.
joke: Quarter mile at a time, but with lots of questions.

title: Mission: Probable
plot: An agent takes on missions that are actually pretty easy.
joke: This tape will not self-destruct.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Commerce
plot: Wizards open a small business in Diagon Alley.
joke: The real magic is in the marketing.

title: Lord of the Onion Rings
plot: A hobbit must destroy a deep-fried snack before it’s eaten.
joke: One ring to rule them all, and in the fryer bind them.

title: The Silence of the Yams
plot: A detective interviews a suspiciously quiet vegetable.
joke: Would you like some fava beans with that?

title: The Matrix: Rebooted Router
plot: Neo discovers the real Matrix is just bad Wi-Fi.
joke: There is no connection.

title: Pirates of the Carib-Bean
plot: Pirates search for the legendary magic coffee bean.
joke: Why is the rum gone? Because it’s coffee now.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade Coupon
plot: Indy races to redeem a coupon before it expires.
joke: He chose... wisely. 10% off.

title: Back to the Furniture
plot: A time traveler accidentally invents the recliner.
joke: Great Scott! This chair has cup holders.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy: Volume Laundry
plot: The Guardians must save the universe’s last laundromat.
joke: I am Groot... and I shrink clothes.

title: The Grand Budapest Motel
plot: A bellboy tries to run a motel with only one room.
joke: Check in, but you can never check out.

title: The Shape of Watermelon
plot: A woman falls in love with a mysterious fruit.
joke: Love at first bite.

title: The Lion King: Hakuna Frittata
plot: Simba opens a breakfast cafe on Pride Rock.
joke: It means no eggs for the rest of your days.

title: The Good, the Bad, and the Snuggly
plot: Three outlaws fight over the world’s softest blanket.
joke: For a few snuggles more.

title: The Breakfast Club Sandwich
plot: Five students bond over their love of deli meats.
joke: Don’t you forget the mayo.

title: The Shawshank Redecoration
plot: An inmate escapes prison to become an interior designer.
joke: Hope is a good thing. So is wallpaper.

title: The Big Lebowskis
plot: A group of bowlers open a chain of rug stores.
joke: This rug really ties the room together.

title: Pulp Friction
plot: A group of criminals try to rob a juice bar.
joke: Say 'orange' again.

title: Fight Club Sandwich
plot: The first rule of sandwich club: tell everyone.
joke: You are not your lunch.

title: The Social Network Error
plot: A Harvard student invents a website that never loads.
joke: Connection timed out.

title: The Wolf of Wall-Mart
plot: A stockbroker tries to sell everything in the store.
joke: Buy low, sell rollback.

title: The King's Peach
plot: A monarch overcomes his fear of fruit.
joke: Long live the fruit.

title: No Country for Old Pens
plot: A sheriff searches for a missing ballpoint.
joke: Call it. Heads or ink.

title: The Departed Pizza
plot: An undercover cop delivers pizza to the mob.
joke: Who ordered the deep cover dish?

title: The Green Mild
plot: A prison guard discovers the power of herbal tea.
joke: Miracles happen, one sip at a time.

title: Saving Private Ramen
plot: A squad risks everything to rescue a noodle chef.
joke: War is hell, but dinner is worse.

title: The Usual Sus-pens
plot: A group of criminals are held together by office supplies.
joke: Who is Keyser Paperclip?

title: Goodfellas Pizza
plot: Mobsters open a pizzeria with questionable toppings.
joke: As far back as I can remember, I always wanted extra cheese.

title: For a Few Dollars S'more
plot: Cowboys duel over the last marshmallow.
joke: The good, the bad, and the gooey.

title: The Maltese Falconry
plot: A detective investigates a missing bird trainer.
joke: It’s the stuff that birds are made of.

title: Casablan-cafe
plot: A love story brews in a Moroccan coffee shop.
joke: Here’s looking at you, brew.

title: Gone with the Window
plot: A Southern belle loses her favorite curtains.
joke: Frankly, my dear, I love drapes.

title: Singin' in the Drain
plot: A plumber tap dances through a flooded city.
joke: What a glorious feeling, I’m unclogging again.

title: The Sound of Mucus
plot: A governess teaches children to sing through their colds.
joke: The hills are alive... with sneezing.

title: E.T. the Extra Testy
plot: An alien gets cranky when his phone plan expires.
joke: E.T. phone customer service.

title: Honey, I Shrunk the Groceries
plot: A scientist accidentally miniaturizes the weekly shopping.
joke: The milk is now 2% of its original size.

title: The Parent Trapdoor
plot: Twins swap places using a secret passage.
joke: Double trouble, single exit.

title: The Princess Bridezilla
plot: A princess turns into a monster on her wedding day.
joke: Mawwiage is what bwings us together... and destroys the city.

title: The Karate Kidnap
plot: A martial artist must rescue his sensei from a rival dojo.
joke: Wax on, wax off, break in.

title: The Sixth Scent
plot: A boy can smell things that others cannot.
joke: I smell dead people.

title: The Polar Expresso
plot: A magical train delivers coffee to the North Pole.
joke: All aboard the caffeine express!

title: The Chronicles of Naania
plot: Children discover a magical world through a bakery.
joke: The lion, the witch, and the warm bread.

title: The Da Vinci Cod
plot: A symbologist investigates a fishy conspiracy.
joke: The clues are in the scales.

title: The Devil Wears Nada
plot: A fashion editor starts a nudist magazine.
joke: Runway takes on a whole new meaning.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Buttonhole
plot: A man ages backwards, but his shirts never fit.
joke: He was born with a tailor.

title: The Hurt Locker Room
plot: A bomb squad defuses gym lockers.
joke: Cut the red wire, or just use the combination.

title: The Blind Sidewalk
plot: A football player helps pedestrians cross the street.
joke: He blocks for everyone.

title: The King's Speech Bubble
plot: A king learns to communicate through comics.
joke: Long live the pow!

title: The Artist Formerly Known as Prince
plot: A silent film star changes his name to a symbol.
joke: This movie has no dialogue, just funky beats.

title: Life of Pie
plot: A boy survives at sea with only dessert.
joke: The tiger prefers apple.

title: Les Misérab-burgers
plot: A man steals a burger and sings about it for three hours.
joke: Do you hear the people eat?

title: Django Unchained Melody
plot: A bounty hunter serenades his targets.
joke: He shoots, he scores... a record deal.

title: Frozen Yogurt
plot: Two sisters open a dessert shop in Arendelle.
joke: Do you want to build a sundae?

title: Gravity Boots
plot: An astronaut loses her shoes in orbit.
joke: Houston, we have a footwear problem.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignoring Tweets)
plot: A washed-up actor refuses to join social media.
joke: He’s trending in real life.

title: Whiplash Dance
plot: A drummer joins a competitive ballroom team.
joke: Not my tempo, but great footwork.

title: The Imitation Game Show
plot: A mathematician hosts a quiz show for computers.
joke: Can you pass the Turing test?

title: Mad Max: Furry Road
plot: Post-apocalyptic pets race for the last squeaky toy.
joke: What a lovely day for a walk.

title: Inside Outtakes
plot: Emotions mess up their lines in the mind’s blooper reel.
joke: Sadness keeps laughing.

title: The Revenant: Bear Grills
plot: A frontiersman is saved by a barbecue-loving bear.
joke: He survived on honey-glazed salmon.

title: La La Lamp
plot: Two dreamers fall in love at a lighting store.
joke: A bright romance.

title: Moonlight Savings
plot: A young man struggles to adjust his clocks.
joke: He finds himself an hour ahead.

title: Manchester by the Seaweed
plot: A janitor inherits an underwater kelp farm.
joke: It’s a salty drama.

title: Get Out(side)
plot: A man discovers the real horror is fresh air.
joke: He forgot his sunscreen.

title: Call Me by Your Game
plot: Two teens fall in love over a board game.
joke: Love is a roll of the dice.

title: The Shape of Otter
plot: A woman falls for a mysterious aquatic mammal.
joke: Love is slippery.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri Compromise
plot: A woman rents three billboards to advertise her garage sale.
joke: Everything must go!

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever 21
plot: T’Challa shops for new threads.
joke: Vibranium skinny jeans.

title: A Star is Corn
plot: A singer rises to fame at a state fair.
joke: Shallow, but buttery.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody in Blue
plot: A rock star joins a jazz band.
joke: Is this the real jazz?

title: Green Book Club
plot: Two men bond over their love of reading.
joke: They take turns picking the genre.

title: Parasight
plot: A family pretends to be optometrists.
joke: They see right through you.

title: Once Upon a Time in... Fridge
plot: A washed-up actor finds fame in a cooking show.
joke: Keep it cool, Hollywood.

title: Joker Card
plot: A failed comedian becomes a professional poker player.
joke: Why so serious? It’s just a game.

title: 1917 Calories
plot: Two soldiers race to deliver a sandwich before lunch ends.
joke: Every bite counts.

title: Knives Out of the Drawer
plot: A detective investigates missing cutlery.
joke: The butler did the dishes.

title: Ford v Ferrari: Go-Kart Drift
plot: Racers battle for supremacy at the local fun park.
joke: Winner gets free tokens.

title: Little Women, Big Shoes
plot: Four sisters inherit a clown shoe factory.
joke: One size fits all.

title: Soul Food
plot: A jazz musician finds meaning in a bowl of gumbo.
joke: He’s got rhythm and spice.

title: Nomadlandlord

joke: Home is where the lease is.

title: Minari Salad
plot: A family grows vegetables in Arkansas.
joke: Fresh from the farm to the table.

title: Promising Young Bun
plot: A baker seeks revenge with pastries.
joke: She’s got a roll to play.

title: The Father Figure
plot: A man struggles to assemble IKEA furniture.
joke: Some assembly required.

title: Sound of Metal Detector
plot: A drummer finds treasure at the beach.
joke: He’s got rhythm and gold.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7-Eleven
plot: Activists protest the price of slushies.
joke: Justice is served cold.

title: King Richard's Pawn Shop
plot: A father coaches his daughters in the art of bargaining.
joke: He’s got game and deals.

title: Dune Buggy
plot: A young man races across the desert in a souped-up vehicle.
joke: Fear is the mind-killer, but sand gets everywhere.

title: West Side Storyboard
plot: Two rival artists battle over a comic strip.
joke: When you’re a Jet, you draw with the best.

title: Licorice Pizza Delivery
plot: Teenagers start a candy-themed pizzeria.
joke: Sweet and savory.

title: CODA Keyboard
plot: A girl finds her voice through piano lessons.
joke: She hits all the right notes.

title: Don't Look Upwards
plot: Scientists warn about a falling ceiling tile.
joke: It’s coming down fast.

title: Drive My Carpool
plot: A playwright finds inspiration in traffic.

title: The Power of the Dog Park
plot: A rancher discovers the joys of fetch.
joke: He’s top dog.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once Upon a Time
plot: A woman jumps through multiverses to find her lost keys.

title: Top Bun
plot: Fighter pilots compete in a baking contest.
joke: Danger zone: gluten.

title: Avatar: The Way of Watermelon
plot: Na’vi discover a new fruit on Pandora.

title: Elvis Parsley
plot: A singer spices up the music scene.
joke: Thank you, very garnish.

title: The Fabel-mans

title: Triangle of Sandwich

joke: Crusts are optional.

title: Women Talking Heads
plot: A group of women form a new wave band.
joke: This must be the place.

title: All Quiet on the Western Font
plot: Typographers battle for control of Helvetica.
joke: Serif or sans? Choose your side.

title: The Whale Watchers
plot: A teacher inspires students to protect marine life.
joke: It’s a whale of a tale.

title: Tár-tar Sauce
plot: A conductor loses her lunch before a big performance.
joke: She’s in a pickle.

title: The Banshees of Inisherin-cream
plot: Two friends feud over the last scoop of ice cream.
joke: It’s a cold war.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender's Spoon
plot: A young hero must master all four utensils.
joke: There is no fork.

title: Barbie-Q
plot: Barbie hosts a backyard cookout.
joke: Life in plastic, it’s fantastic... and smoky.

title: Oppenheimer's Microwave
plot: A scientist invents the ultimate popcorn machine.
joke: Now I am become butter.

title: Past Livestrong
plot: Two childhood friends reconnect at a cycling event.
joke: It’s a wheel-y emotional ride.

title: The Holdoversized Sweater

joke: One size fits all feelings.

title: Poor Things, Rich Plot
plot: A woman reinvents herself with a twist.
joke: She’s got a lot of character.

title: Anatomy of a Fall Guy
plot: A stuntman is framed for a crime he didn’t commit.
joke: He always lands on his feet.

title: The Zone of Interest Rates
